infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to allow you to scan food items and upload profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses the photo library to allow you to select photos for your profile or food logs.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app uses HealthKit to read your glucose data to provide insights and predictions.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app uses HealthKit to write glucose data from manual entries.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow SugarSense.ai to access your photos to select images for food logging and profile updates.
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow SugarSense.ai to access your camera to take photos for food logging and profile updates.
